title: CORRECTING and REPLACING FairWarning for Salesforce Enables HIPAA Compliance For Salesforce Health Cloud
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 3:03 PM   FairWarning, Inc. 
SAN FRANCISCO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Please replace the release dated September 17, 2015 with the following corrected version due to multiple revisions. 
The corrected release reads: LESSONS LEARNED FROM PATIENT PRIVACY MONITORING IN EHRS WILL ACCELERATE HIPAA COMPLIANCE IN THE CLOUD, SAYS FAIRWARNING CEO AT DREAMFORCE ‘15 FairWarning Solution Helps Healthcare Providers and Other Covered Entities Comply with Federal HIPAA Requirements 
Speaking at Dreamforce ’15 during the Salesforce Health Cloud for AppExchange Partners breakout session, FairWarning, Inc’s CEO Kurt J. Long emphasized how the company’s next-generation of FairWarning for Salesforce will help enable healthcare providers to rapidly apply best practices to user activity monitoring and key elements of the HIPAA Protocol. 
FairWarning for Salesforce is available today via the Salesforce AppExchange . 
“FairWarning patient privacy solutions are used by more than 7,400 healthcare facilities across the world and support more than 300 healthcare applications,” said Long. “Leveraging our healthcare expertise, we have developed a solution that enables Salesforce customers to rapidly apply best practices to user activity monitoring and other key elements of the HIPAA protocol. 
FairWarning recently announced its next-generation FairWarning for Salesforce solution to provide Salesforce customers with an easy-to-install, easy-to-understand solution to manage data protection and governance from anywhere, anytime. Organizations in any regulated industry can use FairWarning’s cloud-based data protection and regulatory compliance solution to more efficiently review and proactively gain insights into user activity on sensitive investor, consumer, patient and customer information in a customer’s Salesforce environment. 
Salesforce, AppExchange and others are among the trademarks of salesforce.com , inc. 
About FairWarning® 
FairWarning® is a leading provider of solutions which expand trust in mission critical applications, such as Electronic Health Records and cloud applications, empowering businesses to grow their reputation for protecting confidentiality, scale their digital initiatives and comply with complex Federal and state privacy laws such as HIPAA, PCI, SOX, FISMA and EU Data Protection Act. FairWarning provides a comprehensive platform for performing access reports, enforcing access policies, conducting legal investigations, and improving compliance effectiveness. By partnering with FairWarning®, businesses are able to focus on their core competencies, knowing that their data is secure.
